issue.title: easySDI user is not correctly loaded in Orders and requests list views
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

When an order is treated, the created_by field which is Joomla user id, is replaced by sdiUser id.

When list views orders or requests are loaded, the Joomla user can not be correctly loaded and a PHP warning is raised.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1
